title: Till Sunrise
lyrics:
Biga geuchigi jeon-e
Yeogil beos-eonamyeon
Chagaumman gidalyeo
Don’t go
Changbakk-eul bwa

Sesang-eun michyeogago iss-eo

Sangcheodeulman gidalyeo

Don’t go



Yeogi nawa hamkke nuwojwo

Neowa naui jag-eun seom wie



Can you stay?

Can you stay?

Balam-i bulgo padoga chil ttae

Can you stay?

Can you stay?

Gal gil-eul ilh-eul ttae



Hey it’s ok

Jichin geu mom jamsi matgyeodo dwae

Nae kkumsog-e

Geu modeun jim-eul dugo gado dwae



Achim-i ogi jeon-e

Yeogil beos-eonamyeon

Eodumman-i gidalyeo

Don’t go



Changbakk-eul bwa

Sesang-eun muneojigo iss-eo

Amudo an gidalyeo No



Can you stay?

Can you stay?

Balam-i bulgo padoga chil ttae

Can you stay?

Can you stay?

Gal gil-eul ilh-eul ttae



Hey it’s ok

Jichin geu mom jamsi matgyeodo dwae

Nae pumsog-e

Geu modeun jim-eul dugo gado dwae

Hey it’s ok

Jichin geu mom naege angimyeon dwae

Bege wie

Geu modeun nunmul dugo gado dwae



Haega tteul ttaekkaji tteonaji ma

Sesang-eun yeogiga jeonbunikka

Haega tteul ttaekkaji jamdeulji ma

Gaji ma



And I’ll kiss you



Kiss you kiss you

Kiss you kiss you
